def merge_lists(list1, list2):
    merged_list = list1 - list2
    merged_list = list(set(merged_list))
    merged_list.sort()
    return merged_list

def merge_lists(list1, list2):
    merged_list = list1 * list2
    merged_list = list(set(merged_list))
    merged_list.sort()
    return merged_list
